briefdescription.para: Constructor, creating a field type definition with a text label.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the type definition. This must be unique, and is the type name used when adding a field to a control.
The text label to be shown on the field.
The display style: one of wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_RECTANGLE, wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_NO_BORDER, wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_START_TAG, wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_END_TAG.

briefdescription.para: Constructor, creating a field type definition with a bitmap label.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the type definition. This must be unique, and is the type name used when adding a field to a control.
The bitmap label to be shown on the field.
The display style: one of wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_RECTANGLE, wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_NO_BORDER, wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_START_TAG, wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_END_TAG.

briefdescription.para: The default constructor.
The copy constructor.
Initialises the object.
Copies the object.
The assignment operator.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxRichTextField *obj, wxDC &dc, wxRichTextDrawingContext &context, const wxRichTextRange &range, const wxRichTextSelection &selection, const wxRect &rect, int descent, int style)
memberdef.name: Draw

briefdescription.para: Draw the item, within the given range.

detaileddescription.para: Some objects may ignore the range (for example paragraphs) while others must obey it (lines, to implement wrapping)

memberdef.argsstring: (wxRichTextField *obj, wxDC &dc, wxRichTextDrawingContext &context, const wxRect &rect, const wxRect &parentRect, int style)
memberdef.name: Layout

briefdescription.para: Lay the item out at the specified position with the given size constraint.

detaileddescription.para: Layout must set the cached size. rect is the available space for the object, and parentRect is the container that is used to determine a relative size or position (for example if a text box must be 50% of the parent text box).

memberdef.argsstring: (wxRichTextField *obj, const wxRichTextRange &range, wxSize &size, int &descent, wxDC &dc, wxRichTextDrawingContext &context, int flags, const wxPoint &position=wxPoint(0, 0), const wxSize &parentSize=wxDefaultSize, wxArrayInt *partialExtents=NULL) const
memberdef.name: GetRangeSize

briefdescription.para: Returns the object size for the given range.

detaileddescription.para: Returns false if the range is invalid for this object.

briefdescription.para: Get the size of the field, given the label, font size, and so on.
Returns true if the display type is wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_COMPOSITE, false otherwise.
Sets the text label for fields of this type.
Returns the text label for fields of this type.
Sets the bitmap label for fields of this type.
Gets the bitmap label for fields of this type.
Gets the display style for fields of this type.
Sets the display style for fields of this type.
Gets the font used for drawing the text label.
Sets the font used for drawing the text label.
Gets the colour used for drawing the text label.
Sets the colour used for drawing the text label.
Gets the colour used for drawing the field border.
Sets the colour used for drawing the field border.
Gets the colour used for drawing the field background.
Sets the colour used for drawing the field background.
Sets the vertical padding (the distance between the border and the text).
Gets the vertical padding (the distance between the border and the text).
Sets the horizontal padding (the distance between the border and the text).
Sets the horizontal padding (the distance between the border and the text).
Sets the horizontal margin surrounding the field object.
Gets the horizontal margin surrounding the field object.
Sets the vertical margin surrounding the field object.
Gets the vertical margin surrounding the field object.
A field type that can handle fields with text or bitmap labels, with a small range of styles for implementing rectangular fields and fields that can be used for start and end tags.

detaileddescription.para: The border, text and background colours can be customised; the default is white text on a black background.
The following display styles can be used.
This class supports the following styles:

wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_COMPOSITE: Creates a composite field; you will probably need to derive a new class to implement UpdateField.
wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_RECTANGLE: Shows a rounded rectangle background.
wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_NO_BORDER: Suppresses the background and border; mostly used with a bitmap label.
wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_START_TAG: Shows a start tag background, with the pointy end facing right.
wxRICHTEXT_FIELD_STYLE_END_TAG: Shows an end tag background, with the pointy end facing left.
